body:
[Test artifacts](https://pantheon.corp.google.com/storage/browser/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/23302/kubernetes-pull-test-unit-integration/19096/).

I could reproduce this after 50 runs on my local machine. It may only show up with go 1.6.

```
=== RUN   TestEventCreated
I0322 14:10:33.495829   32653 horizontal.go:120] Starting HPA Controller
I0322 14:10:33.497904   32653 horizontal.go:337] Successfull rescale of test-hpa, old size: 1, new size: 2, reason: CPU utilization above target
W0322 14:10:33.498785   32653 horizontal.go:101] Failed to reconcile test-hpa: failed to compute desired number of replicas based on CPU utilization for replicationcontrollers/test-namespace/test-rc: failed to get CPU utilization: failed to get CPU consumption and request: some pods do not have request for cpu
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Read by goroutine 48:
  runtime.convT2E()
      /usr/local/go/src/runtime/iface.go:128 +0x0
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.(*testCase).verifyResults()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:325 +0x2ef
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.(*testCase).runTest()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:342 +0x723
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.TestEventCreated()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:667 +0x20e
  testing.tRunner()
      /usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:473 +0xdc

Previous write by goroutine 52:
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.(*testCase).prepareTestClient.func11()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:311 +0x4c8
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/testing/core.(*SimpleReactor).React()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/testing/core/fixture.go:271 +0x7c
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/testing/core.(*Fake).Invokes()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/testing/core/fake.go:124 +0x36f
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/typed/generated/core/unversioned/fake.(*FakeEvents).CreateWithEventNamespace()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/typed/generated/core/unversioned/fake/fake_event_expansion.go:31 +0x3c9
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/typed/generated/core/unversioned.(*EventSinkImpl).Create()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/typed/generated/core/unversioned/event_expansion.go:148 +0x6e
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.recordEvent()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:174 +0x215
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.recordToSink()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:131 +0x1ef
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.(*eventBroadcasterImpl).StartRecordingToSink.func1()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:113 +0x5f
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.(*eventBroadcasterImpl).StartEventWatcher.func1()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:232 +0x14e

Goroutine 48 (running) created at:
  testing.RunTests()
      /usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:582 +0xae2
  testing.(*M).Run()
      /usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:515 +0x11d
  main.main()
      k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/_test/_testmain.go:98 +0x210

Goroutine 52 (running) created at:
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.(*eventBroadcasterImpl).StartEventWatcher()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:234 +0x8f
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record.(*eventBroadcasterImpl).StartRecordingToSink()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/client/record/event.go:114 +0x9b3
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.NewHorizontalController()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal.go:70 +0x140
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.(*testCase).runTest()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:332 +0x60c
  k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler.TestEventCreated()
      /workspace/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/podautoscaler/horizontal_test.go:667 +0x20e
  testing.tRunner()
      /usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:473 +0xdc
==================
--- PASS: TestEventCreated (12.00s)
```

On a related note, `time.Sleep` in a unit test is a huge red flag.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: Data race in pkg/controller/podautoscaler
